name: Create an invoice
description: Create an invoice for your customer.

arguments.name: customer_id
arguments.description: ID of the customer the invoice has to be created.

arguments.name: currency_id
arguments.description: The currency id of the currency

arguments.name: contact_persons
arguments.description: Array of contact person(s) for whom invoice has to be sent.

arguments.name: invoice_number
arguments.description: Search invoices by invoice number.Variants:

arguments.name: invoice_number_startswith
arguments.description: Search invoices by invoice number.Variants:

arguments.name: invoice_number_contains
arguments.description: Search invoices by invoice number.Variants:

arguments.name: place_of_supply
arguments.description: Place where the goods/services are supplied to. (If not given,

arguments.name: vat_treatment
arguments.description: (Optional) VAT treatment for the invoices. VAT treatment denotes the location of the customer, if the customer resides in UK then the VAT treatment is

arguments.name: tax_treatment
arguments.description: VAT treatment for the invoice .Choose whether the contact falls under:

arguments.name: gst_treatment
arguments.description: Choose whether the contact is GST registered/unregistered/consumer/overseas. Allowed values are

arguments.name: gst_no
arguments.description: 15 digit GST identification number of the customer.

arguments.name: cfdi_usage
arguments.description: Choose CFDI Usage. Allowed values:

arguments.name: reference_number
arguments.description: The reference number of the invoice

arguments.name: template_id
arguments.description: ID of the pdf template associated with the invoice.

arguments.name: date
arguments.description: Search invoices by invoice date. Default date format is yyyy-mm-dd.

arguments.name: payment_terms
arguments.description: Payment terms in days e.g. 15, 30, 60. Invoice due date will be calculated based on this. Max-length [100]

arguments.name: payment_terms_label
arguments.description: Used to override the default payment terms label. Default value for 15 days is "Net 15 Days". Max-length [100]

arguments.name: due_date
arguments.description: Search invoices by due date. Default date format is yyyy-mm-dd.

arguments.name: discount
arguments.description: Discount applied to the invoice. It can be either in % or in amount. e.g. 12.5% or 190. Max-length [100]

arguments.name: is_discount_before_tax
arguments.description: Used to specify how the discount has to applied. Either before or after the calculation of tax.

arguments.name: discount_type
arguments.description: How the discount is specified. Allowed values:

arguments.name: is_inclusive_tax
arguments.description: Used to specify whether the line item rates are inclusive or exclusivr of tax.

arguments.name: exchange_rate
arguments.description: Exchange rate of the currency.

arguments.name: recurring_invoice_id
arguments.description: ID of the recurring invoice from which the invoice is created.

arguments.name: invoiced_estimate_id
arguments.description: ID of the invoice from which the invoice is created.

arguments.name: salesperson_name
arguments.description: Name of the salesperson. Max-length [200]

arguments.name: custom_fields
arguments.description: Custom fields for an invoice.

arguments.name: line_items
arguments.description: Search invoices by item id.

sub_attributes.name: time_entry_ids
sub_attributes.description: IDs of the time entries associated with the project.

sub_attributes.name: hsn_or_sac
sub_attributes.description: Add HSN/SAC code for your goods/services

sub_attributes.name: sat_item_key_code
sub_attributes.description: Add SAT Item Key Code for your goods/services. Download the

sub_attributes.name: unitkey_code
sub_attributes.description: Add SAT Unit Key Code for your goods/services. Download the

sub_attributes.name: name
sub_attributes.description: The name of the line item. Max-length [100]

sub_attributes.name: description
sub_attributes.description: The description of the line items. Max-length [2000]

sub_attributes.name: item_order
sub_attributes.description: The order of the line item_order

sub_attributes.name: unit
sub_attributes.description: Unit of the line item e.g. kgs, Nos. Max-length [100]

sub_attributes.name: discount_amount
sub_attributes.description: The discount amount on the line item

sub_attributes.name: discount
sub_attributes.description: Discount applied to the invoice. It can be either in % or in amount. e.g. 12.5% or 190. Max-length [100]

sub_attributes.name: tags
sub_attributes.description: Filter all your reports based on the tag

sub_attributes.name: tag_option_id
sub_attributes.description: ID of the reporting tag's option

sub_attributes.name: tax_treatment_code
sub_attributes.description: Specify reason for using out of scope.Supported values for UAE are

arguments.name: payment_options
arguments.description: Payment options for the invoice, online payment gateways and bank accounts. Will be displayed in the pdf.

sub_attributes.name: payment_gateways
sub_attributes.description: Online payment gateways through which payment can be made.

sub_attributes.name: configured
sub_attributes.description: Boolean check to see if a payment gateway has been configured

sub_attributes.name: gateway_name
sub_attributes.description: Name of the payment gateway associated with the invoice. E.g. paypal, stripe.Allowed Values:

arguments.name: allow_partial_payments
arguments.description: Boolean to check if partial payments are allowed for the contact

arguments.name: notes
arguments.description: The notes added below expressing gratitude or for conveying some information.

arguments.name: terms
arguments.description: The terms added below expressing gratitude or for conveying some information.

arguments.name: shipping_charge
arguments.description: Shipping charges applied to the invoice. Max-length [100]

arguments.name: adjustment
arguments.description: Adjustments made to the invoice.

arguments.name: adjustment_description
arguments.description: Customize the adjustment description. E.g. Rounding off.

arguments.name: tax_authority_id
arguments.description: ID of the tax authority. Tax authority depends on the location of the customer. For example, if the customer is located in NY, then the tax authority is NY tax authority.

arguments.name: tax_exemption_id
arguments.description: ID of the tax exemption.

arguments.name: avatax_use_code
arguments.description: Used to group like customers for exemption purposes. It is a custom value that links customers to a tax rule. Select from Avalara [standard codes][1] or enter a custom code. Max-length [25]

arguments.name: avatax_exempt_no
arguments.description: Exemption certificate number of the customer. Max-length [25]

arguments.name: tax_id
arguments.description: ID of the tax.

arguments.name: salesorder_item_id
arguments.description: ID of the sales order line item which is invoices.

arguments.name: avatax_tax_code
arguments.description: A tax code is a unique label used to group Items (products, services, or charges) together. Refer the [link][2] for more deails. Max-length [25]

arguments.name: time_entry_ids
arguments.description: IDs of the time entries associated with the project.

arguments.name: send
arguments.description: Send the invoice to the contact person(s) associated with the invoice. Allowed values

arguments.name: ignore_auto_number_generation
arguments.description: Ignore auto invoice number generation for this invoice. This mandates the invoice number. Allowed values

query_params.name: send
query_params.description: Send the invoice to the contact person(s) associated with the invoice. Allowed values

query_params.name: ignore_auto_number_generation
query_params.description: Ignore auto invoice number generation for this invoice. This mandates the invoice number. Allowed values

name: List invoices
description: List all invoices with pagination.

query_params.name: invoice_number
query_params.description: Search invoices by invoice number.Variants:

query_params.name: item_name
query_params.description: Search invoices by item name.Variants:

query_params.name: item_id
query_params.description: Search invoices by item id.

query_params.name: item_description
query_params.description: Search invoices by item description.Variants:

query_params.name: reference_number
query_params.description: The reference number of the invoice

query_params.name: customer_name
query_params.description: The name of the customer. Max-length [100]

query_params.name: recurring_invoice_id
query_params.description: ID of the recurring invoice from which the invoice is created.

query_params.name: email
query_params.description: Search contacts by email id. Max-length [100]

query_params.name: total
query_params.description: The total amount to be paid

query_params.name: balance
query_params.description: The unpaid amount

query_params.name: custom_field
query_params.description: Search invoices by custom fields.Variants:

query_params.name: date
query_params.description: Search invoices by invoice date. Default date format is yyyy-mm-dd.

query_params.name: due_date
query_params.description: Search invoices by due date. Default date format is yyyy-mm-dd.

query_params.name: status
query_params.description: Search invoices by invoice status.Allowed Values:

query_params.name: customer_id
query_params.description: ID of the customer the invoice has to be created.

query_params.name: filter_by
query_params.description: Filter invoices by any status or payment expected date.Allowed Values:

query_params.name: search_text
query_params.description: Search invoices by invoice number or purchase order or customer name. Max-length [100]

query_params.name: sort_column
query_params.description: Sort invoices.Allowed Values:

query_params.name: zcrm_potential_id
query_params.description: Potential ID of a Deal in CRM.

name: Get an invoice
description: Get the details of an invoice.

query_params.name: print
query_params.description: Print the exported pdf.

query_params.name: accept
query_params.description: Get the details of a particular invoice in formats such as json/ pdf/ html. Default format is json. Allowed values

name: Delete an invoice
description: Delete an existing invoice. Invoices which have payment or credits note applied cannot be deleted.

name: Mark an invoice as sent
description: Mark a draft invoice as sent.

name: Void an invoice
description: Mark an invoice status as void. Upon voiding, the payments and credits associated with the invoices will be unassociated and will be under customer credits.

name: Mark as draft
description: Mark a voided invoice as draft.

name: Email invoices
description: Send invoices to your customers by email. Maximum of 10 invoices can be sent at once.

arguments.name: contacts
arguments.description: Contacts for whom email or snail mail has to be sent.

arguments.name: contact_id
arguments.description: ID of the contact. Can specify if email or snail mail has to be sent for each contact.

arguments.name: invoice_ids
arguments.description: Comma separated invoice ids which are to be emailed.

query_params.name: invoice_ids
query_params.description: Comma separated invoice ids which are to be emailed.

name: Submit an invoice for approval
description: Submit an invoice for approval.

name: Approve an invoice.
description: Approve an invoice.

name: Email an invoice
description: Email an invoice to the customer. Input json string is not mandatory. If input json string is empty, mail will be send with default mail content.

arguments.name: send_from_org_email_id
arguments.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address

arguments.name: to_mail_ids
arguments.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

arguments.name: cc_mail_ids
arguments.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be cced.

arguments.name: subject
arguments.description: The subject of the mail

arguments.name: body
arguments.description: The body of the mail

arguments.name: send_customer_statement
arguments.description: Send customer statement pdf a with email.

arguments.name: send_attachment
arguments.description: Send the invoice attachment a with the email.

arguments.name: attachments
arguments.description: Files to be attached to the email

query_params.name: send_customer_statement
query_params.description: Send customer statement pdf a with email.

query_params.name: send_attachment
query_params.description: Send the invoice attachment a with the email.

query_params.name: attachments
query_params.description: Files to be attached to the email

name: Get invoice email content
description: Get the email content of an invoice.

query_params.name: email_template_id
query_params.description: Get the email content based on a specific email template. If this param is not inputted, then the content will be based on the email template associated with the customer. If no template is associated with the customer, then default template will be used.

name: Remind Customer
description: Remind your customer about an unpaid invoice by email. Reminder will be sent, only for the invoices which are in open or overdue status.

arguments.name: to_mail_ids
arguments.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

arguments.name: cc_mail_ids
arguments.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be cced.

arguments.name: subject
arguments.description: The subject of the mail

arguments.name: body
arguments.description: The body of the mail

arguments.name: send_from_org_email_id
arguments.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address

arguments.name: send_customer_statement
arguments.description: Send customer statement pdf a with email.

arguments.name: attachments
arguments.description: Files to be attached to the email

query_params.name: send_customer_statement
query_params.description: Send customer statement pdf a with email.

query_params.name: attachments
query_params.description: Files to be attached to the email

name: Get payment reminder mail content
description: Get the mail content of the payment reminder.

name: Bulk invoice reminder
description: Remind your customer about an unpaid invoices by email. Reminder mail will be send, only for the invoices is in open or overdue status. Maximum 10 invoices can be reminded at once.

query_params.name: invoice_ids
query_params.description: Array of invoice ids for which the reminder has to be sent.

name: Bulk export Invoices
description: Maximum of 25 invoices can be exported in a single pdf.

query_params.name: invoice_ids
query_params.description: Comma separated invoice ids which are to be export as pdf.

name: Bulk print invoices
description: Export invoices as pdf and print them. Maximum of 25 invoices can be printed.

query_params.name: invoice_ids
query_params.description: Export invoices as pdf and print them. Maximum of 25 invoices can be printed.

name: Disable payment reminder
description: Disable automated payment reminders for an invoice.

name: Enable payment reminder
description: Enable automated payment reminders for an invoice.

name: Write off invoice
description: Write off the invoice balance amount of an invoice.

name: Cancel write off
description: Cancel the write off amount of an invoice.

name: Update billing address
description: Updates the billing address for this invoice alone.

arguments.name: address
arguments.description: Billing address for the invoice

arguments.name: city
arguments.description: City of the customer’s billing address.

arguments.name: state
arguments.description: State of the customer’s billing address.

arguments.name: zip
arguments.description: Zip code of the customer’s billing address.

arguments.name: country
arguments.description: Country of the customer’s billing address.

arguments.name: fax
arguments.description: Customer's fax number.

name: Update shipping address
description: Updates the shipping address for this invoice alone.

arguments.name: address
arguments.description: Shipping address for the invoice

arguments.name: city
arguments.description: City of the customer’s Shipping address.

arguments.name: state
arguments.description: State of the customer’s Shipping address.

arguments.name: zip
arguments.description: Zip code of the customer’s Shipping address.

arguments.name: country
arguments.description: Country of the customer’s Shipping address.

arguments.name: fax
arguments.description: Customer's fax number.

name: List invoice templates
description: Get all invoice pdf templates.

name: Update invoice template
description: Update the pdf template associated with the invoice.

name: List invoice payments
description: Get the list of payments made for an invoice.

name: List credits applied
description: Get the list of credits applied for an invoice.

name: Apply credits
description: Apply the customer credits either from credit notes or excess customer payments to an invoice. Multiple credits can be applied at once.

arguments.name: invoice_payments
arguments.description: ID of the payment

sub_attributes.name: amount_applied
sub_attributes.description: The applied amount to the creditnote

arguments.name: apply_creditnotes
arguments.description: ID of the creditnote

sub_attributes.name: amount_applied
sub_attributes.description: The applied amount to the creditnote

name: Delete a payment
description: Delete a payment made to an invoice.

name: Delete  applied credit
description: Delete a particular credit applied to an invoice.

name: Add attachment to an invoice
description: Attach a file to an invoice.

query_params.name: can_send_in_mail
query_params.description: True to send the attachment with the invoice when emailed.

query_params.name: attachment
query_params.description: The file to be attached.Allowed Extensions:

name: Update attachment preference
description: Set whether you want to send the attached file while emailing the invoice.

query_params.name: can_send_in_mail
query_params.description: Boolean to send the attachment with the invoice when emailed.

name: Get an invoice attachment
description: Returns the file attached to the invoice.

query_params.name: preview
query_params.description: Get the thumbnail of the attachment.

name: Delete an attachment
description: Delete the file attached to the invoice.

name: Delete the expense receipt
description: Delete the expense receipts attached to an invoice which is raised from an expense.

name: Update custom field in existing invoices
description: Update the value of the custom field in existing invoices.

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Value of the Custom Field

arguments.name: organization_id
arguments.description: ID of the organization

query_params.name: organization_id
query_params.description: ID of the organization

name: Add comment
description: Add a comment for an invoice.

query_params.name: show_comment_to_clients
query_params.description: Boolean to check if the comment to be shown to the clients

name: List invoice comments & history
description: Get the complete history and comments of an invoice.

name: Update comment
description: Update an existing comment of an invoice.

query_params.description: The comment on a invoice
